title: Tell me about a memorable phone conversation.

korean: 가장 기억에 남는 전화통화는 작년에 해외에 있을 때 받은 전화예요.
처음에는 무슨 급한 일인가 싶어서 깜짝 놀랐어요.
그런데 알고 보니 시차를 까먹으신 거더라고요.
한국은 저녁 시간이었으니까 그냥 전화하신 거죠.
저는 잠이 확 깬 상태였지만 엄마 목소리 들으니까 반갑더라고요.
그래서 그냥 한 시간 넘게 통화했어요.
별다른 얘기는 아니었고 그냥 일상적인 이야기들.
집에서 키우는 강아지 얘기, 동네 소식 같은 거요.
지금 생각해보면 그게 되게 위로가 됐던 것 같아요.
타지에서 외로울 때 가족 목소리 듣는 게 큰 힘이 되더라고요.
그 이후로는 시차 상관없이 전화하라고 했어요.
english: The most memorable phone call I got was when I was abroad last year.
It was like 3 in the morning when I got a call from my mom in Korea.
At first, I was totally shocked, thinking something urgent had happened.
But it turned out she just forgot about the time difference.
It was evening time in Korea, so she just called without thinking.
I was wide awake by then, but hearing my mom's voice made me happy.
So we just talked for over an hour.
It wasn't anything special, just everyday stuff.
Like stories about our dog at home, neighborhood news, things like that.
Looking back, I think that conversation was really comforting.
When you're lonely in a foreign place, hearing your family's voice gives you strength.
After that, I told her to call anytime, regardless of the time difference.
